item.title: Implementing an ASP.NET Core API with .NET 9 and OpenAPI
item.description: This post implements a basic ASP.NET Core API using .NET 9 and the Microsoft OpenAPI implementation. The OpenAPI Nuget package supports both Controller based APIs and minimal APIs. Until now, we used excellent solutions like NSwag to produce the API schemas which can be used to auto-generate client code. Code: https://github.com/damienbod/WebApiOpenApi Setup A .NET 9 [â€¦] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2024/08/06/implementing-an-asp-net-core-api-with-net-9-and-openapi/
